title: [Snyk] SNYK-DEBIAN13-GLIBC-5680884 in glibc/libc-bin@2.41-12+deb13u1
description:
## Uncontrolled Recursion

**Severity:** low
**Package:** glibc/libc-bin@2.41-12+deb13u1
**File:** `score-processor-lambda/Dockerfile`

**CVSS Score:** 7.5  
**Snyk Priority Score:** 150/1000

### CVEs
- [CVE-2018-20796](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-20796)

**Fix:** No automatic fix available. Review manually.

### Details
## NVD Description
**_Note:_** _Versions mentioned in the description apply only to the upstream `glibc` package and not the `glibc` package as distributed by `Debian`._
_See `How to fix?` for `Debian:13` relevant fixed versions and status._

In the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) through 2.29, check_dst_limits_calc_pos_1 in posix/regexec.c has Uncontrolled Recursion, as demonstrated by '(\227|)(\\1\\1|t1|\\\2537)+' in grep.
## Remediation
There is no fixed version for `Debian:13` `glibc`.
